sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The praise of a pretty lasse: or, The young mans dissimulation: else hee would not disgrace a maiden in such fashion, to the tune of, Bank's game.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
By M.P. for F. Grove, neere the Sarazens Head with-out New-gate., Printed at London : [1638?]
Publication date suggested by STC. Verse: "Young men and maidens, to you Ile declare ..." In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======

Publication date suggested by STC. Verse: "Young men and maidens, to you Ile declare ..." In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
